title: Simulation-Based Workshop for Strengthening Global Business Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of business terminology and proficiency in smartphone usage
context.additional_context: For learners lacking business problem-solving experience in multicultural settings but interested in developing job-applicable competencies

learning_goals: By establishing collaborative strategies across three or more cultural contexts and developing action plans through an international business simulation task, learners apply conceptual knowledge.
Through reflective practice reports (minimum two) and peer feedback in virtual global team (GVT) activities, learners enhance sociocultural practice competencies.
By analyzing five or more international business scenarios and maintaining a reflective journal, learners strengthen self-awareness and reflective capabilities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
